programme.desc: Menarik Sepuluh mengumpulkan 10 kisah unik dan menarik berlaku di mana sahaja

programme.title: (L) UTAMA
programme.desc: UTAMA merupakan segmen berita utama yang memaparkan Berita Terkini di seluruh Malaysia dan dunia.

programme.title: (L) Tempat Kita
programme.desc: Mengetengahkan laporan mengenai keindahan serta lokasi menarik di dalam negeri.

programme.title: (L) Inspirasi Duniamu
programme.desc: Menginspirasi penonton dengan pelbagai isu semasa, komuniti, usaha kebajikan dan realiti kehidupan darisetiapsudut.

programme.title: Cuti-Cuti Sarawak Tersayang Kamek S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hosted by Vincent and Elya, takes viewers to lesser-known Sarawak travel locations like Long Bedian, Kabong, and Similajau, providing breathtaking visuals and informative narration about local lifestyles.

programme.title: My Health, My Choice Ep10
programme.desc: My Health, My Choice explores daily practices, behaviors, and health issues, highlighting factors like attitudes, diet, environment, and relationships, and provides practical solutions.

programme.title: The Cloth Story S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Cloth Story season 2 focuses on textiles, such as Pua, Songket, Tenun, Batik and Keringkam from the Borneo region. The cloth, the raw materials, the artisans, the history, the evolution and so much more.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Descendent of The Sun Ep3
programme.desc: This drama tells of the love story that develops between a surgeon and a special forces officer.

programme.title: Ajaib Ep4
programme.desc: Dunia koma Jasmin dan mimpi Maliq mempertemukan mereka dalam satu dunia lain, yang akhirnya membuatkan mereka menjalinkan cinta. Pertemuan di dunia fantasi, akhirnya menyatukan mereka di dunia realiti

programme.title: Pejalai Kamek Orang Ep9
programme.desc: Hosted and narrated by Tony Eusoff, traces locations & stories from people who have heard, experienced and witnessed events right from Brooke Era in 1841 leading up to Sarawaks independence in July 1971

programme.title: Design Nation Ep4
programme.desc: Design Nation is a serial TV magazine that documents the architecture of buildings by well-renowned architects that have won various awards locally and internationally.

programme.title: Headgear Hunting Ep2
programme.desc: Dr Welyne Jehom, an anthropologist, search for expert traditional headgear makers in order to deepen her own knowledge of the craft and preserve the tradition for the benefit of future generations.

programme.title: The Curious Quest Ep2
programme.desc: A curious Sarawakian who wonders about questions that Sarawakians often wonder about history, culture and society. Join Husni as he goes on a quest to find the answers to Sarawaks untold stories.

programme.title: Suara Alam Borneo Ep1
programme.desc: Suara Alam Borneo akan mengupasnya hutan hujan tropika berusia jutaan tahun secara terperinci dengan pelbagai spesis flora dan juga fauna menerusi informasi yang mudah difahami.

programme.title: Cigu! Nadai Bisi Utai Ep4
programme.desc: Halim, seorang guru muda lepasan maktab berusia 25 tahun dari Selangor, dilema menerima tawaran mengajar di sekolah rendah di pedalaman Sarawak. Ibu dan tunang menentang, tetapi bapanya menyokong. Dalam tempoh 30 hari, Halim berusaha memenuhi syarat melapor diri. Di Sarawak, dia menghadapi kesukaran pengangkutan dan penginapan, serta kemalangan,namun...

Orang kampung sedih melihat Mak Yah kerana dia masih lagi belum boleh menerima hakikat kerana semua ini berlaku di atas sikapnya yang sering memarahi anak menantunya sehingga mereka sekeluarga nekad keluar dari rumah dan terlibat dengan kemalangan yang meragut nyawa mereka semua.

Razif ditugaskan untuk mencipta sebuah lagu berunsur keagamaan yang masih ada unsur rock dengan gabungan alunan irama nasyid untuk sebuah OST filem. Dia mula terkesan dengan skrip filem itu yang menyedarkan dia tentang hukum agama. Sejak itu Razif mula mempelajari tentang agama dan telah meninggalkan kesan terhadap keluarganya apabila mereka juga turut disuruh meninggalkan dunia hiburan.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Keharmonian sebuah rumah tangga diragut setelah ketua keluarga dinaikkan pangkat dan hanyut dengan nikmat dunia

programme.title: Stop Baper Yuk Bisa Yuk Move On
programme.desc: Nita mengelak perkahwinan paksa kerana hutang ibu bapanya. Dia bersembunyi di dalam trak tetapi tidak tahu ia sedang menuju ke Jakarta. Kerana tindakannya itu, dia menemui cinta baru dengan pemandu lori itu.

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ramadan Ep41
programme.desc: Satu pertandingan kuiz di mana kanak-kanak menguji pengetahuan dan kecekapan mereka dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat, terutamanya yang berkaitan dengan bulan Ramadan.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep28
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep36
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat dalam bidang nyanyian dangdut bagi musim keenam! Kini, pertandingan telah mencapai peringkat 12 teratas, menjadikan persaingan semakin sengit! Terus saksikan perjalanan yang mendebarkan ini sehingga tiba pada pentas akhir! Siapakah yang bakal menawan tiga tempat teratas?

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep53
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Si Cantik Milik Cowok Cadangan
programme.desc: Bima dijadikan pembantu kepada abangnya. Dia sentiasa bersedia untuk apa sahaja untuk abangnya Arga dan berkongsi apa sahaja, tetapi tidak Lula, seorang wanita yang disukai Bima. Apakah kesimpulannya? Adakah anda fikir Bima akan mengalah kepada Arga?

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep116
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep37
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat dalam bidang nyanyian dangdut bagi musim keenam! Kini, pertandingan telah mencapai peringkat 12 teratas, menjadikan persaingan semakin sengit! Terus saksikan perjalanan yang mendebarkan ini sehingga tiba pada pentas akhir! programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep53
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Si Cantik Milik Cowok Cadangan
programme.desc: Bima dijadikan pembantu kepada abangnya. Dia sentiasa bersedia untuk apa sahaja untuk abangnya Arga dan berkongsi apa sahaja, tetapi tidak Lula, seorang wanita yang disukai Bima. Apakah kesimpulannya? Adakah anda fikir Bima akan mengalah kepada Arga?

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep116
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep37
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat dalam bidang nyanyian dangdut bagi musim keenam! Kini, pertandingan telah mencapai peringkat 12 teratas, menjadikan persaingan semakin sengit! Terus saksikan perjalanan yang mendebarkan ini sehingga tiba pada pentas akhir! Siapakah yang bakal menawan tiga tempat teratas?

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep11
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: How To Steal A Dog
programme.desc: As the family goes bankrupt, Jiso decided to steal dog from wealthy family and return it for the reward money. Will her plan be successful?

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Our School's E.T.
programme.desc: Seong Geun is content with being a P.E teacher, but the school wants to sack him in favor for an English teacher. To survive, he must teach English - but he doesn't speak a word of it.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: I Don'T Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: The King's Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: The Wild
programme.desc: Woo-chul is released early for good behavior after 8 years in jail. His friend Do-sik invites him to join the gang but he wants to live an honest life. Can Woo-chul keep his hands clean?

programme.title: The Lost Choices
programme.desc: A young woman who has speech disorder is raped while on her way home. The police do not believe in her. She is frustrated and thus triggers her silent revenge against the world.

programme.title: Exit

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep27
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2179
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep202
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop is assigned to escort an important witness from the Philippines, only to find himself teaming up with a local cop to bring down a wicked crime syndicate.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: Produced by Jackie Chan, this is the story about the fabled Yang family of female generals in feudal China. Yang Zong Bao, the last man standing in the Yang family, dies in a battle when defending the Song Dynasty from invaders. Zong Baos wife Mu Gui Ying steps up to lead other widows of the Yangs into battle to continue their husbands legacy.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: When a man caught a fish from the lake and grilled it to eat, he heard a weird voice and saw a strange human face on the fish. Weird incidents occurred one after another, before a temple priest exorcises the malicious spirits brought on by the caught fish.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chans first major movies) for an evocative and terrific Martial arts world adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lins husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts Worlds intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.desc: Tamil Coming-of-Age Comedy Film, Starring, Siva Karthikeyan, Bindhu Mathavi, Vimal, Soori & Regina Cassandra

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Changing Planet - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Impalers - Cyril aims to catch a fish that can weigh more than a thousand pounds, and is known to be so strong that fishermen have been impaled by its bill.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep8
programme.desc: Columbia - In Dorset, Ben spends a week with Chris, a former paratrooper who has spent the last five years walking the UK's coastline, finding love and raising thousands for charity.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep21
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into food factories. Today we see the production of hot sauce, lemon Italian ice and packed peanuts.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep22
programme.desc: A look at the production of food in the our food factories. This episode looks at the factories producing mustard, wafer biscuits, teriyaki sauce and coconut macaroons.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Changing Planet - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Simon discovers why millions of tourists flock to the Gold Coast - which has now become the crime capital of Australia.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep23
programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories. This episode looks at factories producing cola, pickled beetroot, swiss rolls and yoghurt.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep24
programme.desc: See billions of Sixlets candies, or the 40,000 heads of cabbage to make 400,000 Zarky's cabbage rolls. Plus American Farmer sweet and salty popcorn is popped, and TGI Friday and Indenture Foods potato skins chips look deli fresh.

programme.title: Equator From The Air S1 Ep4
programme.desc: South East Asia - In South East Asia, booming economies are taking a toll on the natural world. Gordon discovers how eyes in the sky are helping protect endangered orangutans, elephants and people.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Peru - Joel and Nish trek through the Andes with the Peruvian porters. They are on a journey to meet the legendary Scissor Dancers but get more than they bargained for when they arrive.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep14
programme.desc: Transitions - Alaskans harness the power of the sun as they toil through summer.

programme.title: Coastal Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Scotland - Robson visits the west coast of Scotland for some of the area's famous shellfish fishing.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planets biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africas east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - Tropical Shores Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Wild West Ep3
programme.desc: Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scrappy Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias stink bombs; honey badgers savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Kakumbi Are Vulnerable Ep4
programme.desc: Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Tragedy Strikes Kakumbi Ep5
programme.desc: Feel your heart race when the Kakumbi tree a leopard whos been stalking them. Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, explore mealtime pack hierarchy, and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Start of Trauma Season Ep1
programme.desc: Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Operation Pelican Ep2
programme.desc: Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Gutsy Koala Ep3
programme.desc: Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Brisbane Raid Ep4
programme.desc: Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Duckling Dramas Ep5
programme.desc: Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Into the Sunset Ep6
programme.desc: Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scroungers/Scavengers Ep6
programme.desc: Go scavenging with natures cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Manzi the Superpack Ep6
programme.desc: Head back to the den with the Kakumbi, who are mourning the loss of two pups. Chance upon a hyena den and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo, then catch up with the Manzi, who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2020
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2020!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhelpful Queen - One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep17
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Rainy Day - It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep23
programme.desc: Chet Vs Dr. Disorder / Damselfly In Distress - Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep23
programme.desc: Nuttypunny / Jealohsy - When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep45
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep46
programme.desc: Voice Fail Part 1 & 2 - When Grug wakes up without a voice, he and Ugga go on the hunt to find his voice, while Eep, Thunk, and Gran stay behind. But when the Valleyites come to Eep with questions for Grug, she takes this opportunity to be a leader by pretending to have a conversation with Grug in their cave

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep47
programme.desc: Punch Thunk Love / Nay Boors - When Eep and the others try to intervene with Thunk and Blurg's first date, they decide to run away so they can live happily ever after; Snoot and Ugga race each other to get to the Doomsday Skunkguin but are forced to put their differences aside once the weirder animals come out to hunt them down

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep49
programme.desc: Twintuition - When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep49
programme.desc: The Wrath Of Morticus Khan - King Julien clones himself but things take a turn for the worse when Morticus Khan, an evil warlord, unleashes an army of Mort clones on the kingdom

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep23
programme.desc: Ladies Night - Khepra, leader of the Cat Council, takes Cleo, Akila and Callie on a "Ladies' Night Out" at the arcade. Cleo hates it until Khepra picks a fight with some aliens. Then at least there's kicking.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep24
programme.desc: Eyeball - Brian and Akila get trapped inside this weird planet and Brian reprograms a broken Xerx robot and basically, it's like it's their baby. They have to raise it real fast so it can save them from fire monsters and junk.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep45
programme.desc: White Lion - Secrets unfold when the team uses Haggars map to ventur eto a mythical planet

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep46
programme.desc: Omega Shield - The Voltron Coalition begins a massive liberation campaign while Lotor insists on building a ship capable of entering the Quintessence Field

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep46
programme.desc: Cheerleaders / Mansa Musa - Sherman enters a cheerleading competition, but his attempts to get a newly formed squad ready disrupts Peabody's show about famous historical diseases.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep47
programme.desc: Bring Your Kids To Work Day / Leif Erikson - It's Bring Your Kids to Work Day but when the kids act up on the show, the parents must lay down the law...until the adults' parents come on the show.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep19
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter Two - On a quest to find the power gem of fire, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Hawaii. They're confronted with another monstrous guardian inside of a volcano in order to retrieve the gem... but wind up losing the gem to a surfing competition that uses it as part of their surf trophy

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep20
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter Three - Rocky and Bullwinkle battle one more guardian to get the final power gem the wind gem. But theyre soon confronted by a tiny ninja squirrel who comes from a floating city of squirrels in the sky and she believes that Rocky is the chosen squirrel promised by prophesy

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep45
programme.desc: See You Next Pluesday / The Doppelganger - After learning Murph is moving away, Archibald wishes for one last day to spend with her. But when the wish magically comes true, Archibald is forced to relive the same day over and over again. / Archibald meets his doppelganger and enjoys all the fun that comes with having a twin. But when the doppelganger threatens to become a permanent fixture in the Strutter house, Archibald must prove he is the real deal.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep46
programme.desc: 8-Bit of Trouble / The Founding Feathers - When Archibald accidentally gets digitized by Loys laser scanner, he finds himself trapped inside a computer game. / Archibald discovers a long lost play that chronicles the founding of Crackridge. But when he over-promises a same day production, he must scramble to put on the historic show.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep18
programme.desc: Lucky And The Shaky Day - When an earthquake takes out the railroad bridge, the PALs must find a way to stop the oncoming train which Jim is aboard

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs / I Think We're Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem in Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep18
programme.desc: Gluphosaurus - When D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into attacking the Dinotrux, Revvit must befriend them and find a way to unstick the crew from one another.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep70
programme.desc: Make Room For Fifi - There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep18
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cuckoo Clock - When Mum's cuckoo clock breaks time stops and Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill freeze in time. Rupert and the Fox Twins have to find a way to get time ticking again

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep18
programme.desc: The Big Sleep-Walk / Of Course You Can - When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid shell embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep18
programme.desc: Big Dog Job / The Case of the Slobbery - Tag tries to prove to Mom that shes a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep18
programme.desc: The Case Of The Mystery Artist - There's a mystery in Toyland! All the toys have drawn pictures of Deltoid but they've all been scribbled on and ruined! Noddy opens the investigation to find out who is the mystery artist. Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! Noddy suggests that they draw pictures again and this time Deltoid can draw his own picture too. Clever Noddy's saved the day!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep18
programme.desc: Two's Company - Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flamb. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep24
programme.desc: Slide - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep24
programme.desc: Breakers / A Day Without Tech - To save their family vacation, the Tucci's must out-party the hard-partying Breakers; When Boov-tech stops working, Oh goes off the grid.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep47
programme.desc: Lucky and the Warm Welcome - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep48
programme.desc: Lucky and the Dressage Sabotage - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep48
programme.desc: Caverns And Creepers / Rad Teacher - When Eep is kicked out of Thunk's new imaginary role-playing adventure game she decides to play her own, real version of the game; Fed up with Squawk's mean teaching style, Eep has Grug fire him and replace him with Rad, the quintessential young, cool teacher

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep49
programme.desc: Grugs First Chance / Furry Road - Tired of settling disputes between Valleyites, Grug invents Chance, a two-sided rock that can be flipped to determine all decisions in the Valley; In a nature documentary-style, Thunk tells the story of Beary, a peaceful Thunk-like cub that struggles to fit into a violent bear owl culture

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep21
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 1 - As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep50
programme.desc: Blindsided - A huge storm hits Dragon's Edge causing the Dragons to spook and run off but when Astrid is blinded, Hiccup must lead her to Stormfly.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJs birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.
